name: .MKF File Extension
summary: Learn about .MKF files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: Info.mkf is not meant to be opened. Elcomsoft Phone Password Breaker allows users to use an info.mkf file to recover a BlackBerry device's password (in the scenarios described above) and decrypt the files stored on its SD card.
